state_summary: Lumotive, a programmable optics startup, adds Amazon and ITHCA Group as investors to its Series B round, raising $59 million.
evidence: Amazon Industrial Innovation Fund invested in Lumotive's Series B round
ITHCA Group, the technology investment arm of Oman's sovereign wealth fund, also invested in Lumotive's Series B round
Lumotive has raised more than $100 million in venture capital to date
Lumotive's Light Control Metasurface solid-state chips are made up of nano-scale pixels that can be controlled electronically to bend and manipulate light
The company has purposefully kept its list of customers small and focused, with plans to expand sales and marketing

metadata.investor_name: Amazon Industrial Innovation Fund, ITHCA Group
